features: IRON NO MORE: A safer option to conventional ironing: ERV2B Fabric Steamer. Safely an easily creates ultra-powerful continuous steam, In seconds heat-up and up to 8 minutes of continuous steam
Newest steam channeling and nozzle design delivers steam more powerfully and evenly to remove the toughest wrinkles from a multitude of fabrics in drapery, clothing, and much more
Safety: automatic shut-off function when the Unit gets too hot or the water level is too low
Gentle on fabrics: steaming is gentle alternative to standard pressure ironing. Safe on most fabrics, furniture, garments, linens, textiles, Cotton, wool, and removes odors
QUALITY: The name Eureka say it all, don't buy brand you don't know, You buy cheap? You buy twice! ! One Year
body.description: About the streamerPortable fabric steamer is designed to make removing wrinkles a cinch.Fast - Create steam in 80 seconds and up to 6-8 minutes of continuous steam, sterilize, wrinkle and refresh fabric.Compact size - makes it easy to store and perfect for travel, it is a treat to tidying up both at home and on the road, enjoy wrinkle-free elegance no matter where you are.Features - portable garment stream:100ml mini sizes design, convenient for home or travel.Easy to use - 6F extension power cord, on/off switch.Safety guarantee: with overheat protection, it automatic powers off when water runs low.Note -use this streamer only in an up or down vertical motion. Never use stream head in a horizontal position or tilt into a backward position as this may result in a hot water spill.Let the streamer cool completely before storing.Specification -rated voltage: AC 120V, 60Hz -rated power: 600 W -capacity: 138ml -working time: 6-8min -product size: 844 inches -product net weight: 18.4OncePackage includes: -1 x handled streamer -1 x heat resistant travel bag -1 x brush head -1 x measuring cup -1 x user manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds Water To Steam Two Shirts
reviews.reviewText: The Eureka portable steamer does exactly what it claims. It’s lightweight and compact, so it’s perfect if you want to take it along on a trip.It creates a good amount of steam, but it runs out quickly. The reservoir holds enough water to steam about two men’s dress shirts and then I need to fill it up again. It heats up so fast–in under a minute–so I really don’t mind.There are still certain items I want to take the time to iron by hand but for everything else, this works well. If you’re in a hurry or hate the thought of lugging out the ironing board, this handheld gadget is your best bet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good on a single garment
reviews.reviewText: I've read the other reviews, and heeded the warnings. Do NOT overfill the unit. This takes a few minutes to generate the steam, and is very simple to operate. From the attached photos, a before and after on a T-shirt. They recommend distilled water, so grab a bottle on your next grocery trip. My take on this, is that if you have a single garment to de-wrinkle, this is a good tool to use without pulling out an ironing board, and setting up an iron. However, if you have multiple garments, this is not what I would use. It takes longer to steam than it would to iron, but it's convenient for one garment. It comes with a fill cup, and you pour it into the top opening, twist on the steam head, attach the brush tool, and steam away. It also has a storage bag to store it. For travel, it's an OK size, so you'd have to make room for it, and just use tap water. It took an entire fill line worth of water to de-wrinkle a single T-shirt. It does its job well enough, and should come in handy when needed. I was a bit disappointed in the delivery though, as it was not packaged at all, just a shipping label pasted to the manufacturer's box, like it just came off the shelf at the store. It didn't get any damage during shipping, but that doesn't mean it won't if they ship it that way to you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel, bag included 👍
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and NO spitting water!!! I bought a previous one that spit from the get go. I didn't even know that these weren't even supposed to do that. 😕Love my new Eureka steamer for sure! 🥰

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very Handy ! , But.........
reviews.reviewText: After using I really should of got a bigger steamer ,it goes runs out fast !Size planning.... long journey it'll be just right . After I reach new homestead I'll purchase a larger one. Ok for the size for one shirt but a bunch you'll want bigger tool !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little steamer
reviews.reviewText: I’ve owned many steamers (some well over $100). This is the best little steamer ever! It heats up quickly and in 5 minutes I’m done with a blouse or pair of pants. It is small, so you cannot steam multiple items at once. Perfect for my needs, steaming to freshen up out of the suitcase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I had a different steamer before this but it was trash and I was happy when it was stolen. This is by far the most amazing steamer I’ve ever used. It starts up very quickly and removes every wrinkle I’ve tried. Its a super reasonable price too. 10/10 would buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Click to steam in under 1 min
reviews.reviewText: Heats up really quick but it guzzles water. Able to steam only one clothing item at one fill. But works well, has a button to start and stop

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't let the small size fool you!
reviews.reviewText: I recently moved & all of my clothes were heavily wrinkled. They were clean, so I didn't want to wash & dry them. I bought this little gem & it is FABULOUS! I HIGHLY recommend this if you are in the marked for a steamer!
